snippet.title: Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew - First Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1545560 

Welcome to the Lost Caribbean! In this stealth strategy game, join a ghost ship with a living soul and assemble a cursed pirate crew. Embrace magical powers to defy the menacing army of the Inquisition, who stands between you and the mysterious treasure of the legendary Captain Mordechai. 

Coming in 2023! #shadowgambit

Releasing on Steam, Epic Games Store, Xbox Series X|S and PlayStation 5.

---
Chapters

00:00 Game Overview 
00:31 Stealth Strategy Explained
01:21 Story Overview 
01:45 Game Perspective And Controlling Characters 
02:44 How To Manipulate Time
03:31 How To Unlock And Play Your Pirate Crew 
04:52 How To Combine Abilities 
05:34 Player Freedom And Finding Your Own Solution 
06:14 Exploring The Game World And Mission Structure
06:38 Wishlist Now!

---
Trailer Credits

• Concept: Mimimi Games
• Director & Editor: Derek Lieu
• Music: Filippo Beck Peccoz
• Audio:  Philipp Sellier
